name: 動力學
description: 動力學是物理學的基礎內容，也是物理在工程應用的理論起點。工程及科技學院的許多科系都有開設動力學。本課延續靜力學，從質點、質點系統到剛體，從一維、二維到三維空間，從運動學、動力學、功能原理、衝動量原理等原理，介紹基本原理及在工程上的應用。本課同時為後續的機構學、機器動力學、系統動力學、結構動力學及振動學奠定基礎。
goals: 理解動力學原理之工程應用
解決動力學之工程應用問題
學習動力學原理(外文動力學書籍)
syllabus:
【授課方式：18週】

1\. Kinematics of a particle: rectilinear motion

2\. Kinematics of a particle: curvilinear motion

3\. Kinetics of a particle: Newton’s law

4. Kinetics of particle: force and acceleration

5\. Test 1; Kinetics of particle: work and energy

6\. Kinetics of particle: work and energy

7\. Kinetics of particle: impulse and momentum

8. Kinetics of particle: impulse and momentum

9\. Test 2; Planar kinematics of a rigid body: translation and rotation

10\. Planar kinematics of a rigid body: relative motion

11\. Planar kinetics of a rigid body: force and acceleration

12\. Planar kinetics of a rigid body: force and acceleration

13. Test 3; Planar kinetics of a rigid body: work and energy

14\. Planar kinetics of a rigid body: work and energy

15\. Planar kinetics of a rigid body: impulse and momentum

16. Planar kinetics of a rigid body: impulse and momentum

17\. Test 4

18\. Summary

methodologies.note: 定義、原理及應用範例解說

grading.note: 4次紙筆測驗、命題形式為計算題(每次佔25%)
